item.title: 加纳新任央行行长誓言 "积极 "应对通货膨胀
item.description: 加纳新任央行行长誓言要实施明确的政策，重点是抑制给家庭和企业带来沉重负担的通货膨胀。【原文：Ghana’s new central bank governor has vowed to implement clear policies with a focus on curbing inflation that’s been weighing on households and businesses.】

item.title: 了解美国的鸡蛋危机，看看中国的猪肉
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 尼日利亚外汇储备缩水威胁奈拉近期涨势
item.description: 在央行支持奈拉的情况下，尼日利亚的外汇储备已连续 33 天下降，这加剧了人们对该货币未来可能会变得脆弱的担忧。【原文：Nigeria’s foreign reserves have fallen for 33 straight days amid central bank support for the naira, fanning concern the currency could be vulnerable going forward.】

item.title: 欧洲销量下滑，特斯拉市值跌破 1 万亿美元
item.description: 周二，在欧洲汽车销售大幅放缓的报道下，特斯拉公司股票的快速平仓使这家电动汽车制造商的市值跌破了梦寐以求的1万亿美元大关。【原文：A quick unwind in the shares of Tesla Inc. pushed the electric-vehicle maker’s market capitalization below the coveted $1 trillion-mark on Tuesday, amid reports of a stark slowdown in car sales in Europe.】

item.title: 美国消费者对前景的信心创 2021 年以来最大降幅
item.description: 美国消费者信心指数本月创下自 2021 年 8 月以来的最大跌幅，原因是人们对经济前景感到担忧，这进一步证明特朗普政府政策的不确定性正在对家庭造成压力。【原文：US consumer confidence fell this month by the most since August 2021 on concerns about the outlook for the broader economy, adding to evidence that uncertainty over the Trump administration’s policies is weighing on households.】

item.title: 华丽 7》跌入修正区间，特斯拉表现落后
item.description: 在过去两年中，S&P 500 指数的大部分涨幅都是由七家最大的公司推动的，而这些公司在 2025 年的开局并不顺利，它们陷入了调整区间，价值减少了约 1.4 万亿美元。【原文：Seven of the biggest companies that have powered the majority of the S&P 500 Index’s gains over the past two years are not having a great start to 2025 — plunging into correction territory and erasing approximately $1.4 trillion in value.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气价格昂贵，行业面临多年不确定性风险
item.description: 欧洲复兴开发银行（European Bank for Reconstruction and Development）表示，受天然气成本高企和美国等地竞争之苦的欧洲工业在规划未来时将面临多年的不确定性。【原文：European industries suffering from high gas costs and competition from places like the US face years of uncertainty when planning their future, the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development said.】

item.title: 据说利洁时将为 50 亿英镑的家庭护理产品出售敲定投标人名单
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，利洁时集团（Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc）已为该消费巨头出售的一揽子家庭护理品牌确定了入围竞标者名单。【原文：Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc has shortlisted bidders for a package of homecare brands being sold by the consumer giant, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马阿拉歌协议 "对美元意味着什么？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）咄咄逼人地计划改变美国与世界其他国家的贸易方式，这助长了人们的猜测，即有可能达成一项宏大的多国协议，有意削弱美元汇率，帮助美国出口商与中国和日本等竞争对手竞争。分析人士已经确定了一个名称--"马阿拉歌协议"，取自特朗普在佛罗里达州棕榈滩的私人俱乐部。【原文：President Donald Trump’s aggressive plans to shake up how the US trades with the rest of the world have fueled speculation about the potential for a grand multinational bargain that would deliberately weaken the dollar — helping American exporters compete with rivals such as China and Japan. Analysts have already settled on a name, the “Mar-a-Lago Accord,” after Trump’s private club in Palm Beach, Florida.】

item.title: 尼日利亚服务业国内生产总值实现三年来最快增长
item.description: 在服务业的推动下，尼日利亚第四季度的经济增长速度为三年来最快。【原文：Nigeria’s economy grew at the fastest pace in three years in the fourth quarter, buoyed by its services sector.】

item.title: 英国石油公司与伊拉克敲定基尔库克油田振兴协议
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）与伊拉克政府敲定了重新开发基尔库克（Kirkuk）巨型油田的协议，该协议标志着该公司重返中东路线，并将有助于提高欧佩克（OPEC）成员国的产量。【原文：BP Plc finalized an agreement with the government of Iraq to redevelop the giant Kirkuk oil fields, a deal that signals a return to the company’s Middle Eastern routes and should help to bolster production from the OPEC member.】

item.title: 乌克兰液化天然气贸易商有望在四月前签署供应协议
item.description: 乌克兰最大的私营能源公司 DTEK 预计将在未来两个月内宣布一项向该国进口液化天然气的协议。【原文：Ukraine’s largest private energy company, DTEK, expects to announce a deal within the next two months to import liquefied natural gas into the country.】

item.title: 干旱导致亏损，巴西水道运营商延续跌势
item.description: Hidrovias do Brasil SA 是一家通过亚马逊河及其支流运输大豆和玉米的驳船运营商，该公司在披露因严重干旱导致的亏损后，连续第六天下挫。【原文：Hidrovias do Brasil SA, an operator of barges that transports soybeans and corn via the Amazon and its tributaries, extended a selloff to a sixth day after disclosing a loss driven by a severe drought.】

item.title: S&P认为匈牙利汇率和福林风险来自大选前的支出
item.description: S&P全球评级公司称，匈牙利政府在大选前做出的支出承诺使其减少预算赤字和支撑福林的努力变得更加复杂，从而给匈牙利经济的健康发展带来风险。【原文：Hungary’s government is risking the health of its economy with pre-election spending promises that complicate efforts to reduce its budget deficit and shore up the forint, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 法国 Altice 公司与债权人接近达成债务重组协议
item.description: 亿万富翁帕特里克-德拉希（Patrick Drahi）的电信运营商法国阿尔迪斯公司（Altice France）即将与债权人敲定一项协议，以削减该公司86亿欧元（约合90亿美元）的债务，换取非控股股权和治理变革。【原文：Billionaire Patrick Drahi’s telecom provider Altice France is close to finalizing a deal with creditors to cut the company’s debt pile by €8.6 billion ($9 billion) in exchange for a non-controlling equity stake and governance changes, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 德国大力推广绿色电力，预计到 2026 年底将降低电价
item.description: 据市场分析师称，德国推动建设更多可再生能源发电设施的举措将在明年年底前开始降低电力批发价格。【原文：A push to build more renewable generation in Germany will begin to bring down wholesale power prices by the end of next year, according to market analysts.】

item.title: 美银美林称，即使首次公开募股萎靡不振，欧洲大宗交易仍在飙升
item.description: 欧洲的大宗交易迎来了自 2021 年以来最强劲的开局，这与人们对首次公开募股的热情有所减弱不符。【原文：European block trades are off to their strongest start for the year since 2021, defying the tempered enthusiasm for initial public offerings.】

item.title: 随着买家回流，12 月美国房价涨势加快
item.description: 由于被压抑的购房需求推动了对有限房源的竞争，12 月份房价涨势升温。【原文：Home-price gains heated up in December as pent-up buyer demand drove competition for a limited supply of listings.】

item.title: 测量死亡率风险的智能手表是保险公司的新工具
item.description: 再保险公司慕尼黑再保险公司（Munich Re）和分析公司Klarity的一份新报告称，智能手表和其他可穿戴技术有可能通过提供有关个人死亡风险的更好数据，改变人寿保险的定价。【原文：Smartwatches and other wearable technologies have the potential to change the pricing of life insurance policies by offering better data about individuals’ mortality risk, according to a new report by reinsurance company Munich Re and analytics firm Klarity.】

item.title: 私有化交易正在缩小巴西受伤的证券交易所
item.description: 近年来，由于高利率抬高了估值，数十家公司纷纷退出巴西股市，巴西企业也在排队弃市。机会型投资者正张开双臂等待着。【原文：Companies are lining up to abandon Brazil’s stock market, joining dozens that have left in recent years as high interest rates sap valuations. Opportunistic investors are waiting with open arms.】

item.title: 葡萄牙银行的森特诺希望看到更多的上市贷款机构
item.description: 葡萄牙银行行长马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）表示，他希望有更多的银行在葡萄牙股票市场上市。【原文：Bank of Portugal Governor Mario Centeno said he would like to have more banks listed on the country’s stock market.】

item.title: 安哥拉石油公司Sonangol重申股份出售计划
item.description: 安哥拉国营石油公司Sonangol称，该公司仍在为首次公开发行多达30%的股份而努力。【原文：Sonangol, Angola’s state oil firm, said it’s still working toward an initial public offering of as much as 30% of its shares.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行利率接近中性，所有选项均开放
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧洲中央银行正在接近一个新的体制，在这个体制中，货币政策不再制约经济，未来的决策将以数据为依据。【原文：The European Central Bank is approaching a new regime in which monetary policy no longer constrains the economy and will base future decisions on data as they arrive, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: IonQ 正洽谈以约 2.5 亿美元收购 ID Quantique
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，IonQ 公司正在就收购 ID Quantique 公司进行深入谈判，该公司自称是量子安全网络加密专家。【原文：IonQ Inc. is in advanced talks to acquire ID Quantique, a company that describes itself as a specialist in quantum-safe network encryption, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔对降息持谨慎态度，因为利率可能不会受到限制
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）表示，欧洲中央银行应谨慎降低借贷成本，因为其当前的货币政策立场可能不再阻碍该地区的经济发展。【原文：The European Central Bank should lower borrowing costs cautiously as its current monetary-policy stance may no longer be holding back the region’s economy, according to Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel.】

item.title: 魁北克养老金公司将以 70 亿美元收购 Innergex Renewable 公司
item.description: 加拿大养老金管理公司 Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec 同意收购 Innergex Renewable Energy Inc.【原文：Canadian pension manager Caisse de Depot et Placement du Quebec agreed to acquire Innergex Renewable Energy Inc. in an all-cash deal valuing the company at about C$10 billlion ($7 billion) including debt.】

item.title: 巴西财政部长称卢拉赋予他修复预算的使命
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）说，他已直接从总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦那里接受了平衡公共账目的任务。【原文：Brazil finance chief Fernando Haddad said he has received the mission to balance public accounts directly from President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva, whom many investors see as unwilling to make the painful spending cuts that goal demands.】

item.title: 俄罗斯加强秘密货物转运以保证石油运输
item.description:
隐蔽的船对船转运释放了油轮，但尚未帮助交付

。【原文：

Hidden ship-to-ship transfers free up tankers, but have yet to aid deliveries

】

item.title: 匈牙利在马托尔斯时代结束时维持基准利率不变
item.description: 匈牙利连续第五个月维持关键利率不变，此前通胀加速促使决策者实际上排除了在未来几个月内削减利率的可能性。【原文：Hungary left its key interest rate unchanged for a fifth month after accelerating inflation pushed policymakers to effectively rule out cuts in the months ahead.】

item.title: 米莱效应百万美元合同吸引阿根廷球星回家
item.description: 阿根廷深陷一系列似乎永无休止的经济危机，几十年来一直在勉强输出顶级足球运动员。尽管当地球迷热情高涨，但这里的球队始终没有足够的财力与国外顶级俱乐部的合同相抗衡。【原文：Mired in a seemingly never-ending series of economic crises, Argentina has, grudgingly, been exporting its top soccer players for decades. As passionate as the local fan base may be, the teams here simply never had enough financial might to compete with the contracts dangled by top foreign clubs.】
